website_summaries.verdict: Interesting concept, but it might be hard to get used to dealing with a plastic wine glass with no stem.
pros: Great idea – keep in the freezer and forget about chilling your wine
Also, use for more than just wine – cocktails, juice, etc
cons: Only two in a set, plus you are essentially drinking out of a plastic glass

customer_reviews.title: Want my money back
customer_reviews.text: One of the glasses shattered after putting in the freezer for a day.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: The cooling gel turned brown
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the gray cups and the coral cups. They are fine. Both turquoise cups cooling gel turned brown in the freezer. Now I can’t return them it’s past the return date.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Leaf

customer_reviews.title: Split open the first time it was put in the freezer
customer_reviews.text: One of the glasses split wide open the first time it was put in the freezer, the crack was about half an inch at its widest and ran about 50% of the way around the perimeter of the glass. Apparently this is a common occurrence for these. It's hard to believe that can occur in a product meant to be frozen, especially when they're $10 per glass. Seems like determining the expansion percentage of the freezing gel would be pretty basic engineering, but I guess not.
customer_reviews.author: J. W. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your beverage cold even at the beach!
customer_reviews.text: Received a set for Christmas last year. Didn't use until a vacation to Florida this spring. Worked fantastic so had to get another set. Throw them in your freezer for a few hours and your favorite drink stays cold. Used them at the beach, on the balcony of a condo with 85+ degrees and they kept the beverage cold until or beyond when refilling.
customer_reviews.author: Jill R. Bash

customer_reviews.title: ice cold wine
customer_reviews.text: I often sip my white wine and hate when in the summer especially the wine gets warm. I also don't want to delute my wine with ice cubes. I just love these glasses that keep my wine icy cold until I drink the last drop and even into my second glass. The strip around the upper middle helps to keep the glass from slipping. I plan to buy more for when we entertain.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnnie B

customer_reviews.title: INFERIOR PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these cooling cups twice. The first order split almost immediately and was returned. However, I did love the idea of this freeze cup for my wine so I reordered another set. This last set lasted longer than the first, but have also split in half. Very disappointed and I will return this last order since I think $25.00 is an exorbitant price for this inferior product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fell Apart
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. They were great for the first couple of times using them. One has completely come apart at the seam and all the stuff in the bottom that freezes leaked out. The other one looks like it won't be long before it falls apart as well. Would not recommend anyone to purchase these.
customer_reviews.author: JKimbrough

customer_reviews.title: Works great for short time.
customer_reviews.text: These will lengthen the amount of time that your drink stays cool. Will even cool a room temperature drink. However, the time it remains cool is nowhere near the length of time claimed. I have only used these inside at room temperature of between 68 and 70 and works approximately one hour.
customer_reviews.author: MovieLady

customer_reviews.title: Good gift!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my mom who loves her patio in the summer months. While they do the job of keeping your cooling your drink for a period of time, they aren’t amazing. My family loves tervis tumblers and she swears those keep your drink cold for much longer. Still a nice gift and she likes it for white wine that hasn’t been chilled yet!
customer_reviews.author: SLTelescope

customer_reviews.title: Stay class my friend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friend for her birthday. She loves drinking wine a lot. Sometimes she opens the wine so fast she doesn’t even care if it’s chilled so I thought this would be nicer then putting ice in the wine glass. Hopefully this makes her wine drinking classy.
customer_reviews.author: Lizbanta

customer_reviews.title: Giftable Problem Solver
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product for the price! Gave it as a gift and had to order a second set for a friend to gift and a third for myself! Definitely would see myself buying another/or more set(s) as birthday gifts this year Anyone who drinks wine knows the struggle of buying a bottle for dinner or after a long day and having to deal with warm wine or accidentally freezing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Break in freezer
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that these keep my wine cold, but I ordered 3 sets (6 glasses) and 2 of them broke when I froze them. The other 4 worked, but not a good ratio of functioning glasses. Then I had another one break in the freezer. When the gel freezes and expands, there is not enough room evidently and so the plastic just cracks. I love this idea - sure wish it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Favorite for White Wine
customer_reviews.text: Love drinking white wine out of these and enjoying the continued chill. Easy to rinse and re-freeze I have not had any issues with quality after a pretty good amount of use over a year's time. Highly recommend, originally got these as a gift and gave this purchase as a gift to my mom.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the time to chill the glass.
customer_reviews.text: Not that happy with the feel of the glasses or the lack of coldness it transfer to the liquid. It is not a nice transistion from the plastic to the ribbon. What I mean is you can feel where one ends and the other begins and the ribbon is not flat on all sides. Placed glasses in the freezer for 3 days then poured a drink into the glass. The liquid was cold but not as cold if I used ice. Does not look as nice as shown on the web site.
customer_reviews.author: D. Neeley

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses, perfect for Florida
customer_reviews.text: Love the glasses. Put them on the top shelf of my freezer which is zero degrees. I take them from freezer to my Lanai with 80+ degree temperature. No defects or problems. Bought in 2019.
customer_reviews.author: likebooks

customer_reviews.title: Worked well but didn't last.
customer_reviews.text: My wife really enjoyed using these wine glasses; they did a noticeable job of keeping her wine cold (she enjoys fridge cold wine, wine purists be damned). However, just like other reviews, one of the glasses cracked in the freezer. The glass had never been dropped or damaged. So it worked, but now one of the two is cracked. Functionally it is good, but longevity is poor. I probably wouldn't recommend buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Nice cool first glass
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy using these glasses, they are easy to hold...I purchased some aluminum insulated glasses and they were so slippery they fell right out of my hands! I keep these in my freezer and enjoy a nice cool glass of wine but they do not stay cold enough for a refill but I have 2 so I just return the first and take out the second! Am overall very happy with these glasses.lo
customer_reviews.author: Suzi T

customer_reviews.title: Cups leak gel. No good.
customer_reviews.text: Figured the 4.5 stars was a good sign. First set of cups that came were leaking even before I used them. There was already some gel in the plastic wrapping that the cups came in. Sent them back for replacements. Replacements are starting to leak, too, after a single use. You'd think the company could figure out a way to keep the gel inside of the plastic layers. Maybe use a rubber o-ring to help keep it sealed as the plastic expands/contracts. Anyway, I'm going to see if I can fix these somehow, but you're getting a 1 star unless you can send me a replacement that isn't going to disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: D Tran

customer_reviews.title: Great glass, great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: In the past 10 months I've purchased 2 sets of 2 and 2 sets of 4 wine glasses. They are great. I did have one come apart, called the company they were kind and helpful and sent me a replacement. I love great customer service and great wine glasses. Highly recommend - enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Cajigas

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these as a gift to someone and had to try out ourselves. SO WORTH IT! Keeps my wine chilled for about 3 refills and they freeze back up quickly. Love, love, love them.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: This was my second order of these freezer wine cups
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a single one of these in the heat of the summer/August. I wanted to sit outside and sip rose' or white wine without it turning lukewarm before the glass was finished. Once I tried the first one I ordered this set of 2 the next time. I wouldn't use it for a very expensive wine, but for everyday sipping, it is exactly what I want.
customer_reviews.author: KayJ

customer_reviews.title: The first set was for my bar - to have an option for my best friend who never thinks her white wine is cold ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd set of these glasses I have ordered. The first set was for my bar - to have an option for my best friend who never thinks her white wine is cold enough. She loved them so much that I ordered a set for her bar for Christmas. I ordered the third set for a gift exchange at a holiday party, and they were THE gift to steal. They keep the wine cold, and do not make your hands cold while holding them. The only complaint is that they are a bit heavier than a standard wine glass..
customer_reviews.author: KAZ

customer_reviews.title: These are just ok.  They thaw relatively quickly.  But do cool the wine for a but.
customer_reviews.text: They freeze alright, but they really don't keep the wine cold, barely cool and they defrost rather quickly. But they do work (albeit for just a short while). I think the fact that they are plastic affects the conductive properties of the cups. I have beer mugs with the same basic concept and those seem to work fine, even freezing the beer sometimes. But not these?? Although I have not tried them with beer. I should explain. My wife likes cold wine, and these just don't keep the wine cold enough for long enough for her. I think they are ok.
customer_reviews.author: A. Junco

customer_reviews.title: Durable and does its job
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these glasses. With quarantine, my husband and I have been getting a bottle of white wine and going to sit outside on our apartment lawn and have a picnic. These are perfect at keeping the wine at the right temperature and not having to worry about it getting warm. The only thing that is a little inconvenient with these glasses is they are NOT dishwasher safe. I knew that would most likely be the case b/c they are insulated and have gel inside them. But it is still a minor inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect glass of red & white
customer_reviews.text: Great product that performs as good as they look. Perfect for red and white. If you typically put a few cubes of ice in your glass of Pinot Grigio this will be a game changer for you. Also great for reds, after chilling in the fridge they put your glass of Shiraz at the perfect temp. I’ll be ordering 2 more for my home, and gifting dozens over the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Loftin

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used these glasses they were great! However, after being in the freezer for a week or so, the next time I used them they smelled of an odd plastic odor. I tossed them in the trash unfortunately. Would NOT use them or recommend them. Also made the wine taste "off".
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: receiver loves the gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift and the recipient loves them, uses them daily. They wash easily and stay in the freezer ready for use. They are a little cold in your hand while using them.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Your Vino is waiting for this wine glass!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of these for my daughter for a birthday gift! They are really pretty! You put them in the freezer a couple hours before you are ready to have a glass of wine, and they perfectly chill your red or white wine! I liked these so much I ordered a set for myself!!
customer_reviews.author: Renae

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for keeping white wine cold, or chilling it if you bring home a bottle from the shelf. Works great on beer, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these wine glasses!! I have some and bought my step mom these for Christmas. They are great, I use mine all the time!!! They will keep your wine chilled for at least an hour or two.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: They work!!!
customer_reviews.text: These were given as gifts to my sister and her daughter. I don’t know if they have been used for warm drinks but they have certainly enjoyed them for cold. They have served their guests with them and they have remarked very positively on them?!
customer_reviews.author: A. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: keeps drinks cold for awhile
customer_reviews.text: The cup only stays cold for so long.. but if you're drinking your drinks fast it will be okay. Smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Good concept, terrible execution
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are so small, you only get a few sips of wine. But worse than that is the fact that they don't even chill the wine. These have been in the freezer for days, upside down as the directions stated. The wine did not even get cold. Wish I could return but its too late.
customer_reviews.author: renee1610

customer_reviews.title: Keep wine chilled
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed. I think that the band should be positioned where you hold the glass. Otherwise they freeze well and keep my wine chilled without ice.
customer_reviews.author: shantillyd

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff. Nice.
customer_reviews.text: She liked them. Was a gift to my friends wife who is into wine. Got her a bunch of wine accessories in the past. This fit the bill. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jevans

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for minimal cooling
customer_reviews.text: I don't hate these, but for the price they don't really do much. There is a small amount of gel in the structure and it keeps the bottom half inch of your liquid cold. I would not buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Rod D.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to hold onto!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used it once, and found it pretty hard to hold onto. So slippery I almost dropped it a couple of times! I wish the rubber part covered at least half of the glass. But it did a nice job keeping my wine at a good temperature.
customer_reviews.author: babyboomerkid

customer_reviews.title: Should figure out other stickers
customer_reviews.text: I do like these and they do keep the wine cold. My only complaint is that the stickers that say "not diswasher safe, etc" leave a sticky residue that I haven't been able to remove. I've tried the peanut butter trick, soap and water, etc. Nothing seems to work and it distorts the look of the glass also. Irritating!
customer_reviews.author: T. Frantz

customer_reviews.title: Bad Odor
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a terrific product at first. I kept ours in the freezer so it would be ready whenever we wanted to pour a glass of wine. They have developed an odor that hasn't gone away regardless of what I've done to try to remove it. It doesn't affect the actual taste, but we all know that smell has a lot to do with taste, so the result is that it ruins the enjoyment of the glass of wine. I also gave a set as a gift and the recipient of the gift also has had the same thing happen. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam C.

customer_reviews.title: Good - but one broke.
customer_reviews.text: These worked well for about 6 months... then one of them popped open - the seal broke where the gel is contained. It didn't leak or make a mess, just popped open in the freezer so I had to throw it away. The other one still works great... I do enjoy these as I like my red wine slightly chilled but not cold and it's nice to be able to take it out on the patio since it is plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best wine cup!
customer_reviews.text: I just used it today!! It was amazing. It kept my wine cold for a long time and I live in South Florida. Having the lid is amazing to sit outside and not spill. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Alissa Dawn Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: These are lovely wine glasses. It takes about 5 min or longer for warm wine to get cold after taking the glass out of the freezer. It does keep cold wine cold. I enjoy theses
customer_reviews.author: Honeyofsonny

customer_reviews.title: This is a horrible policy. I expected 60-90 days
customer_reviews.text: I received 4 glasses as a gift in June. One cracked almost immediately. Rather than tell them, I thought I would order 2 more and have an extra. Well today another one that was ordered in July (as the replacement) did the same thing. I thought I could get a replacement, but no the 30 days is gone. This is a horrible policy. I expected 60-90 days. These are not cheap! I loved them but do not bother. We live in a northern climate and only take the glass out of the freezer for a glass of white wine in the evening. They must know these are flawed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Loutzenhiser

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: They are super convenient! Stays cold for a long time. Getting more for summer!
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Chills liquids well
customer_reviews.text: These tumblers do the job. They keep liquid cool as advertised, but I totally missed the 8.5 oz volume - that is my bad they are a little smaller than I'd like. I ranked durability as a 3 for now and will update after I have used them for a few months. Overall, if the volume is not an issue, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: K. Corliss

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves these - instant chilled wine! I ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these - instant chilled wine! I do think the quality is a bit lacking. The edge of the glass feels too sharp for drinking, and the side seam is quite noticeable. But they were a big success as a xmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S.

customer_reviews.title: Tipsy cup. Pun intended.
customer_reviews.text: keeps wine cool, just as we wanted. however the cups won’t stay completely vertical? our cups have a bump on the bottom center, which causes the cup to tilt.
customer_reviews.author: Crys

customer_reviews.title: Cute and keeps wine cold.
customer_reviews.text: Cute and keeps wine cold. You really do need to freeze them upside down for the best results.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin McGee

customer_reviews.title: Does a nice job of keeping your drink cold.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the shape, color, the coldness of the drinks. I do not like the condensation from the cup and the fact that it is not dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: TSmo

customer_reviews.title: I really like these. Ordered them because I loved the idea ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. Ordered them because I loved the idea of sipping on my wine in an already chilled glass for when I'm outside, especially on hot summer days, and they did not disappoint. Some of the reviews had me a little hesitant about ordering them (some people complained of leaking) but I've not had this issue. I keep them in my refrigerator all the time and take them out when we want to drink our wine cold.
customer_reviews.author: Arria

customer_reviews.title: It's okay. Didn't come with the lids...
customer_reviews.text: Wish it would stay cooler for longer and we paid extra for the ones with the lids, which did not come... Aside from that they are fun.
customer_reviews.author: fanatic00

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drinks chilled
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these several times since they arrived. Keeps wine, juice, soda chilled. Great for the pool and patio.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper JM

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt buy again
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Thwy do not keep you drink cooler any longer than any other wine glass. It's not as nice as traditional stemless glasses either They are durable.
customer_reviews.author: Sherese

customer_reviews.title: The freeze and refrigerate well and keep my wine cool even though it may take me hours to remember ...
customer_reviews.text: The freeze and refrigerate well and keep my wine cool even though it may take me hours to remember where I put my glass while I'm cooking or cleaning or chasing my 4 year old around the house. Will probably buy another set so I can have some for entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mark

customer_reviews.title: One glass separated after the third time in the freezer ...
customer_reviews.text: One glass separated after the third time in the freezer. I didn't even put them in the dishwasher. Although it says you can, I washed them by hand. Not well-made it all. For the money, very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: DITAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: they should be priced under 5.00 they don't hold much wine, I have stainless steel wine glasses that do a much better job when I put them in Freezer to cool
customer_reviews.author: A. Porf

customer_reviews.title: Great product overall - poor shipping
customer_reviews.text: The only downside of the product itself is that they are hand wash only. Otherwise, they were perfect for keeping our beverages cold in very hot, sunny weather. HOWEVER - Amazon needs to change something with the shipping. The outer box was crushed and so was the product box! Several other comments say the same thing. For now, DON'T BUY AS A GIFT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I keep one in the refrigerator and one in the freezer so they are always ready whether I'm drinking red or white wine.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Reid

customer_reviews.title: So pretty and it works.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift, the white marble one. They are so pretty. My friend loves them. No longer needs to put ice in her wine.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift- HUGE hit. I read a review saying to freeze them upside down to avoid cracks...Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: crly_wsjhn

customer_reviews.title: Great glass
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I bought this, I love how they keep my Moscato nice and chilled. I highly recommend these freezing wince glass.
customer_reviews.author: olivia boongaling

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: I did like the thin lip on the cup but it is so small. It only holds about 4 oz of wine.
customer_reviews.author: Betty B

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: great for wine lovers. cups stay cold for a long time. no need for ice that waters down your drink.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree bittner

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for wine lovers! My mom loved this because she never remembers to put her white wine in the fridge before drinking.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Nice looking and does the job. Just don’t put them in the dishwarsher
customer_reviews.author: RHK

customer_reviews.title: Quickly bought a bunch more
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic glasses that keep my whites chilled for a long time. Had to to quickly by a bunch more because I loved them so much!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Only had these cups for 3 weeks. They are already cracked. Cheap and easily broken. Both cups broke within days of each other. These cups are meant to be frozen. They were in the freezer overnight. Both obtained major cracks throughout the cups. Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah W.

customer_reviews.title: Who knew this was a thing!?
customer_reviews.text: I tend to drink my wine a little slow. Before I finish it, my chilled wine is room temperature. These cups are perfect. Even after an hour, inside the house, the wine is still refreshing. Definite win.
customer_reviews.author: Vudnder

customer_reviews.title: Alright if the package handlers take care of it
customer_reviews.text: Would have appreciate a little more care with the box it traveled in..
customer_reviews.author: Gannon Diekmann

customer_reviews.title: Keeps cold drinks cold with no ice
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, unbreakable glasses with a gel-filled lining. Keep in the freezer so they’re always ready for a cold drink that will stay cold with no ice.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen E

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Items are MUCH smaller than I thought. It won’t hold a full glass - maybe a half a glass of liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Morrissey

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drink VERY cold
customer_reviews.text: Like how cold they keep the drink. Do not like that the glass "sweats" and leaves water on my table. Like them enough that I purchased a set as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: butch

customer_reviews.title: Great cooling cup!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a guzzler therefore my wine tends to warm up too quickly, and even faster if I'm outside in 90 degree temperature. HOST freeze cooling cup does the job and it looks nice too. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Issues with past product!
customer_reviews.text: I initially ordered this item item some time ago. I did have some issues with the product--I dropped one glass on the the floor and it shattered--OK! The 2nd glass ended up as a rocker because of a rounded base! However, having said that, I ordered another set because I like their functionality! Maybe, the update will be better!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as part of a wedding gift for some good friends. They love them! I have since used them with them and they work just as I had hoped!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie carter

customer_reviews.title: Handy to have
customer_reviews.text: Great concept but you don't want to leave the in to long without cleaning as they get the freezer smell. I have used them a few times and love them
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: Hulk Hands
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend who has Hulk hands and tends to break all wine glasses. After 2 times of this in the freezer, one of our glasses broke apart and is continuously splitting every time it is put in the freezer. Even when he doesn't Hulk him, we have the worst luck with the glasses we get. Guess we should switch to beer!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Nifty way to chill reds.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect way to chill a red down a bit during the warmer summer months, when your 'cellar' might be in the upper 70's, or you're like me and drinking from a boxed wine on the counter over several days. Can probably chill two glasses of red before it needs to go back in the fridge (chill in freezer for whites). Handwash only...l think dishwashers are what's causing some people's problems with seals.
customer_reviews.author: G. Stearns

customer_reviews.title: and the gray area to grasp the glass is above the widest point of the cup so it feels like I might drop the cup at any time
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my husband loves the martini Host cups. These wine cups are small, and the gray area to grasp the glass is above the widest point of the cup so it feels like I might drop the cup at any time. It does keep the wine colder!
customer_reviews.author: LSH

customer_reviews.title: One year and still work great
customer_reviews.text: Hard to understand all of the poor reviews. We have had our 4 Host wine cups for over a year and they still work great. I use them primarily to drink white wine in the summer (Texas). I hand wash them and put them right back in the freezer with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: M F.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product! I had one already and had to get more!!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya M Speight

customer_reviews.title: Could be great but I am unable to use one of the glasses
customer_reviews.text: Thought these cups were going to be great. Went to use one for the first time the other day and the glass would not sit on the counter straight. After looking at the bottom of the glass, it is bulging. This glass is either defective or something happened after freezing it.
customer_reviews.author: Jana Shahla

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping Rose chilled!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for keeping your white & rose wines chilled. I hate having glass outside so this is perfect for dining al fresco, but definitely use it inside as well since I tend to walk away from my glass of wine on occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Gomes

customer_reviews.title: Great gofy
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this to my significant other since we both love wine so much and room temperature is usually cooler so we put these on the freezer around an hour prior to pouring our wine.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Colmenero

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Yet to freeze them, since it for a gift. I since all lot of the review said the gel was broken and the item themselves sink. I open the box to make sure. My items did not sink and my gel was good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Loon

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and plasticky
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plasticky and ugly. The cooling material becomes a chunky mess to look at on the inside. And don’t make the mistake of putting them in a dishwasher. What a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel P.

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: The greatest thing ever. I’m obsessed. I originally ordered as a gift but ended up keeping them lol
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Step up to pool side happy hours
customer_reviews.text: Pool side heaven. My friends all love to come over and have a chilled glass of wine by the pool
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The concept of wine glasses keeping wine cool caught my attention
customer_reviews.text: The concept of wine glasses keeping wine cool caught my attention, the glasses look great. But one glass split after using it a few times. It was never dropped, never in a dishwasher and only used a few times. I wouldn't purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM !
customer_reviews.text: Saw these on Tik TOK and got them for my friend she LOVE THEM !
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: vary happy
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying this product, its great for wine, soda, or even ice cream sundaes. freezes nicely and the silicon grip is great. Making it comfortable to hold in your hand. Would defiantly purchase again for myself or gift to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Wine Sipper Glasses
customer_reviews.text: These work well here in Florida. They keep your wine at the right temp and they do not tip easily either. I am ordering more "for a friend"? lol Nice gifts too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No More Cubes In My Wine!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are very nice and I won't have to put a cube or two in my wine in the future (I really dislike drinking warm wine). They look like glass and it has a wide rubber band around it for a good grip so as not to slip out of your fingers and not cold to the touch. Just great!
customer_reviews.author: AstrogirlTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Christmas gift. Box looks great and instructions are placed on several areas. The cup is very nice easy to hold, durable, all around great looking.
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty nice considering they are plastic. They don't hold a TON of liquid, so get ready for frequent refills. Looking at purchasing the margarita version of this product as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, scotch on the rocks with no rocks!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are awesome, they are a nice size. They are good for anything you want chilled, I pour my wife's wine in one, and scotch and club soda in mine. You don't need any ice as it chills everything in a few seconds I will probably buy another set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps first glass cool, but not the second or third...
customer_reviews.text: Looks gift worthy, but it only works for one glass.
customer_reviews.author: Trow10

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Not really worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive for what you get. Glasses are small and don’t hold a lot of liquid. After drinking 1 glass, cooling gel doesn’t work any longer and you have to put it back in the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: MrsHTexas

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: The 2 glasses I ordered separated at the seam after a few uses and leaked gel on a wooden table, staining the finish...
customer_reviews.author: Vic Dal

customer_reviews.title: No more watered down wine
customer_reviews.text: Keeps your wine cold! Such a great idea! Totally replaces ice cubes
customer_reviews.author: Julia Baraso

product_meta.title: HOST Freeze Cooling Cup, Set of 2 Double Wall Insulated Freezer Chilling Tumbler with Gel, Glasses for Red and White Wine, 8.5 oz, Grey
product_meta.description: It took a year of trial and error to perfect the exact "ultrasonic welding" geometry that joins the clear plastic parts together and allows this cup to mimic the elegant shape of an actual stemless wine glass. The plastic had to be engineered to handle expansion and contraction from the gel freezing as well as extreme cold and warm conditions.
feature_bullets: PERFECT FOR ALL WINES. Achieving the ideal serving temperature for every wine is possible with this set of stemless wine glasses. Each wine tumbler maintains wine’s temperature better than a normal wine glass.
INSULATED WALLS filled with proprietary cooling gel work as a wine chiller when frozen. Pop a tumbler in the freezer for white wines or cool in the fridge to keep red wines at cellar temp.

BPA-FREE PLASTIC construction is sturdy and perfectly suited for outdoor use, An insulated silicone band makes for comfortable handling and ensures that this stemless wine glass set will be your favorite new wine accessories.
SERVE YOUR WINE AT THE RIGHT TEMPERATURE. Generally, white wines should be served cold at 43 to 53 degrees Fahrenheit, and red should be served at just cooler than room temp, around 58 to 60 degrees.
INNOVATIVE GIFT. These wine tumblers are perfect for any occasion or group event and make a great gift for wine lovers or mom on Mother’s Day.
